answers.answer: hi well i know anxiety verry well and it can cause alot of things maybe if you go to your doctor for a checkup you will have some peace of mind but  anxiety can cause you to have symptoms of something and not have that illness like some people have the symptoms of a heart attack they go to the ER and there heart is fine but dont worry about tomorrow live in the present it may be hard at first but it will get easyer maybe your doctor can give you anti anxiety meds and allso prayer helps alot

question: I'm a 26 year old female I'm a bit over weight and I'm tall but since I was about 18 I started getting anxiety at first it was social but I worry about EVERYTHING !!!I I always think I'm dying or have a serious illness like now I'm obsessed with peeing I think I have to pee then I do and I'm scared I have a uti which I've been checked and I don't I donto have diabetes but I'm just scared can anxiety do this ? Can my mind trick my body ?  I just want to be happy
title: Can anxiety cause many different physical symptoms?
